Contact me

You can either message me on reddit, discord or send me a e-mail.

If you want a new item to be added to LUMT, want to chanche anything or add a new list, please either open a issue (recommended) or a pull request. If you don’t know how to do that or don’t have a GitHub account, please choose one of the options listed above the paragraph. See Contributing.

Note: This website is still in development.
